document_data.name: Cool strength
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cool strength''''' was a [[spell]] unique to [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate. This spell was only usable by [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell prevented heat stroke, heat exhaustion, sunburn, and other harmful effects caused by [[the sun]]. This spell could also keep moist creatures from loosing as much water from the sun's heat.
document_data.Components: This spell required a pinch of [[sand]], a drop of water, and a drop of blood from the recipient.
